message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair, right?
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer this time
Okay, I'll take 45 this time.  But next round, it's my turn to make the offer, and I'm not going to be as generous!
I'll give you 35, but I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a fair deal
